Detailed Description

PatchLevelFullFillPattern is a PatchLevelFillPattern that fills the entire region the destination level, both interior and ghost.

For documentation on this interface see xfer::PatchLevelFillPattern

The fill boxes for this "All" PatchLevelFillPattern will consist of the entire region of the destination level that can be filled, both interior and ghost regions.

If a RefineSchedule is created using an RefineAlgorithm::createSchedule which takes no PatchLevelFillPattern argument, this class will be used as the default PatchLevelFillPattern.

See also:
xfer::RefineAlgorithm

xfer::RefineSchedule

PatchLevelFillPattern::computeFillBoxesAndNeighborhoodSets()

The computed fill_mapped_boxes for this fill pattern will be the boxes of dst_mapped_box_level grown by the fill_ghost_width.

SAMRAI_INLINE_KEYWORD bool SAMRAI::xfer::PatchLevelFullFillPattern::needsToCommunicateDestinationFillBoxes (  )  const [virtual]

PatchLevelFillPattern::needsToCommunicateDestinationFillBoxes()

For this fill pattern, the source owner can compute fill boxes for all of its destination neighbors using local data, so this method returns false, allowing a communication step to be skipped.

PatchLevelFillPattern::needsToCommunicateDestinationFillBoxes()

Implements SAMRAI::xfer::PatchLevelFillPattern.

void SAMRAI::xfer::PatchLevelFullFillPattern::computeDestinationFillBoxesOnSourceProc ( FillSet &  dst_fill_boxes_on_src_proc,
const hier::BoxLevel &  dst_mapped_box_level,
const hier::Connector &  src_to_dst,
const hier::IntVector &  fill_ghost_width 
)

Virtual method to compute the destination fill boxes.

If needsToCommunicateDestinationFillBoxes() returns true, then this method will not be called and the child classes do not need an implementation.

This method must be implemented if needsToCommunicateDestinationFillBoxes() returns false, as that means that the source patch owner will compute destination fill boxes using its own local data with this method.

Parameters:
[out] dst_fill_boxes_on_src_proc FillSet storing the destination neighbors of the source mapped boxes
[in] dst_mapped_box_level destination level
[in] src_to_dst Connector of source to destination
[in] fill_ghost_width Ghost width being filled by refine schedule

SAMRAI_INLINE_KEYWORD bool SAMRAI::xfer::PatchLevelFullFillPattern::doesSourceLevelCommunicateToDestination (  )  const [virtual]

PatchLevelFillPattern::doesSourceLevelCommunicateToDestination()

RefineSchedule should attempt to fill the destination level from the source level on the same resolution to the extent possible.

PatchLevelFillPattern::doesSourceLevelCommunicateToDestination()

Implements SAMRAI::xfer::PatchLevelFillPattern.

SAMRAI_INLINE_KEYWORD int SAMRAI::xfer::PatchLevelFullFillPattern::getMaxFillBoxes (  )  const [virtual]

Return the maximum number of fill boxes.

Each destination patch has an associated set of fill boxes, and this is the maximum size of those sets across all destination patches.

The maximum number returned is for the patches on the destination level provided to the most recent invocation of the computeDestinationFillBoxesOnSourceProc method.

Returns:
maximum number of fill boxes.

Implements SAMRAI::xfer::PatchLevelFillPattern.

Return true if the fill pattern is specialized for filling at enhanced connectivity block boundaries only, false for all other cases.
